channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker Publishing Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker Publishing Server

item.title: CVE-2023-44324|2024-03-15T16:38:35.947Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker%20publishing%20server
item.description: Adobe FrameMaker Publishing Server versions 2022 and earlier are affected by an Improper Authentication vulnerability that could result in a Security feature bypass. An unauthenticated attacker can abuse this vulnerability to access the API and leak default admin's password. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-20738|2024-03-15T16:32:10.311Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker%20publishing%20server
item.description: Adobe FrameMaker Publishing Server versions 2022.1 and earlier are affected by an Improper Authentication vulnerability that could result in a Security feature bypass. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanisms and gain unauthorized access. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
